##  `r section_title ` {.tabset .tabset-fade }


```{r echo=FALSE}

if(if_combined){   # plot without meta

    plots <-  MQ_QC_plot(data_table_plot, plot_type = c("bar", "histogram", "box"), cutoff = cutoff, maintitle = maintitle, xlabel = xlabel)
  
}else{  # plot with meta
# put the grouping information into the data.frame
    data_table_plot_merged <- merge(data_table_plot, meta_table, by.x= colnames(data_table_plot)[1], by.y = colnames(meta_table)[1])
    
    # the plot, with meta, which is now column i+1, i is the column index in the meta table
    plots <-  MQ_QC_plot(data_table_plot_merged, plot_type = c("bar", "histogram", "box"), group = colnames(data_table_plot_merged)[i+1],cutoff = cutoff,maintitle = maintitle, xlabel = xlabel)
  
}


```


### Scatter plot

```{r echo=FALSE,fig.width= 8,fig.height= figure_height}
if(params$if_html){

}else{
  plots$bar_plot
}

```
